name: transparent-minimap
description: Make your VS Code minimap transparent, giving you more horizontal room in your editor for coding. You can also choose the color of your minimap if you wish to style it based on your theme

walkthroughs.title: Transparent Minimap Walkthrough

TransparentMinimap.transparencyLevel.markdownDescription:
Transparency level of the minimap.

`00` is full transparent, `88` would be half-transparent and colored, `FF` would be no transparency and full color.

Remember to restart VS Code for the changes to apply
TransparentMinimap.transparencyLevel.patternErrorMessage: Value must be valid 2-decimal hex number (eg. `00` or `AA`)

TransparentMinimap.minimapColor.markdownDescription:
Color of the minimap.

For example, `000000` is no color, `FF0000` would be fully red, `111111` would be faint grey

Remember to restart VS Code for the changes to apply
TransparentMinimap.minimapColor.patternErrorMessage: Value must be valid 6-decimal color hex number (eg. `000000` or `FFAA22`)

TransparentMinimap.enableTransparentMini.markdownDescription:
Enable the extension to change the minimap to be transparent.

Will be worked on in future versions.
